name: RGBattle
description:
RGBattle is a fast paced arcade game made for the BlackThornProd game jam #1. Try and stop the programming bugs, art mistakes, and wrong notes from making their way into your game.

How to Play

  • WASD to move
  • J to set a green trap
  • K to swing a red sword
  • L to shoot a blue bullet
  • Each different attack has a short cool down.
  • Collect clocks to buy time 
  • Press escape to pause

Play on Newgrounds

Tools

  • Engine - Unity
  • Art - Aseprite
  • Music - Beepbox
